raw_text:
Captains lining up for Aid match
 
 Ireland's Brian O'Driscoll is one of four Six Nations captains included in the Northern Hemisphere squad for the IRB Rugby Aid match on 5 March.
 
 France's Fabien Pelous, Gordon Bullock of Scotland and Italy's Marco Bortolami are also in the Northern party. Sir Clive Woodward will coach the Northern team against Rod Macqueen's Southern Hemisphere team in a tsumani fund-raising match at Twickenham. "I'm looking forward to working with such outstanding players," he said. It will be a chance for Woodward to assess some of his options before unveiling his British and Irish Lions touring party, who will visit New Zealand in the summer. "The game promises to be a great spectacle," he said. "Both teams are fielding top-quality sides and I really hope that the rugby public and community get behind this game to raise as much money as possible for such a deserving cause."
 
 L Dallaglio (England), B Cohen (England), A Rougerie (France), D Traille (France), F Pelous (France), R Ibanez (France), P de Villiers (France), B O'Driscoll (Ireland, capt), P O'Connell (Ireland), D Humphreys (Ireland), C Paterson (Scotland), C Cusiter (Scotland), G Bullock (Scotland), S Taylor (Scotland), A Lo Cicero (Italy), M Bortolami (Italy), S Parisse (Italy), D Peel (Wales), C Sweeney (Wales), J Thomas (Wales), R Williams (Wales), J Yapp (Wales).
 
 C Latham (Australia); R Caucaunibuca (Fiji), J Fourie (S Africa) T Umaga (New Zealand), S Bobo (Fiji); A Mehrtens (New Zealand) G Gregan (Australia, capt); T Kefu (Australia), P Waugh (Australia), S Burger (S Africa); I Rawaqa (Fiji), V Matfield (S Africa); K Visagie (S Africa), J Smit (S Africa), C Hoeft (New Zealand). Reserves: B Reihana (New Zealand), B Lima (Samoa), E Taukafa (Tonga), O Palepoi (Samoa), S Sititi (Samoa), M Rauluni (Fiji), A N Other.
llama3.2:1b: Brian O'Driscoll and Marco Bortolami are among four Irish Six Nations captains selected for the IRB Rugby Aid match on 5 March.
The team will be coached by Sir Clive Woodward against a Southern Hemisphere team from Rod Macqueen.
The game aims to raise funds for the Northern hemisphere teams.

Sir Clive Woodward will coach the team against Rod Macqueen's Southern Hemisphere team at Twickenham.
The game features a mix of international players including L Dallaglio, A Rougerie, P de Villiers, and others from England, France, Scotland, Italy, Australia, New Zealand, Fiji, and South Africa.

The game promises to be a great spectacle, with both teams fielding top-quality sides and Woodward expected to assess some of his options before unveiling his British and Irish Lions touring party.

The summary is as follows:

* The IRB Rugby Aid match will be played between Ireland and France, with the Northern Hemisphere squad including four Six Nations captains included in the Northern Hemisphere squad for the match.
* The match will feature a tsumani fund-raising match at Twickenham, where the Irish and French teams will compete against each other to raise as much money as possible for the aid cause.

* The game is expected to be a great spectacle, with both teams fielding top-quality sides and Woodward looking forward to working with such outstanding players to assess their options before unveiling his British and Irish Lions touring party.
* The Northern Hemisphere squad will visit New Zealand in the summer, where they will compete against each other for the aid cause.
* The aid cause is expected to be a great spectacle, with both teams competing to raise as much money as possible for the aid cause.
deepseek-r1:1.5b: The text highlights Brian O'Driscoll from Ireland as the Northern Hemisphere team's captain for an Aid match on March 5th.
It lists Fabien Pelous, Gordon Bullock, and Marco Bortolami from France, and Marco Bortolami from Italy on their squad.
Sir Clive Woodward plans to coach against Rod Macqueen's Southern Hemisphere team at Twickenham.

The match is scheduled for 5 March, and includes details about players and reserves.
tinyllama:1.1b: El equipo de Irlanda, comandado por Brian O'Druscoll, incluye cuatro capitánes para participar en el Aid match del Northern Hemisphere en la temporada de rugby del Reino Unido.

France's Fabien Pelous, Gordon Bullock y Italia's Marco Bortolami también están incluidas en el equipo para un partido de fundación de la Rugby GB contra Rod Macqueen's selección de rugby de Nueva Zelanda en Twickenham.

La edición de 2019 del Aid match tendrá lugar el 5 de marzo, y Woodward, el entrenador británico, pretende evaluar algunas opciones antes de anunciar una selección para la gira Británica-Estadounidense.

"Es un evento increíblemente importante para nosotros y espero que al público y comunidad haga todo lo posible por apoyar este juego," dijo Woodward, que también prevé que la camiseta Británica e Irlanda se presentarán a una campaña de donación para el desarrollo humanitario en Nueva Zelanda.
tinydolphin:1.1b: The rugby match between the Six Nations captains and the Southern Hemisphere All Blacks is set to take place on 5th March in Twickenham Stadium, London.
Sir Clive Woodward will be the coach for the Northern team and they will be up against Rod Macqueen's Southern Hemisphere team.
The game promises to be a great spectacle with both teams featuring top-quality sides and the public getting behind this charity event in New Zealand.
phi:2.7b: Four Six Nations captains will play in a rugby aid match on March 5th, with four Northern Hemisphere teams participating including Ireland's Brian O'Driscoll and Fabien Pelous of France.
The game aims to raise money for charity and the coaches are Sir Clive Woodward and Rod Macqueen.

Sir Clive Woodward will coach the Northern team against Rod Macqueen's Southern Hemisphere team in a tsunami fund-raising match at Twickenham.

granite3.1-dense:2b: Four Northern Hemisphere rugby captains—Brian O'Driscoll (Ireland), Fabien Pelous (France), Gordon Bullock (Scotland), and Marco Bortolami (Italy)—have been selected for the IRB Rugby Aid match on March 5 at Twickenham.
Coached by Sir Clive Woodward, the Northern team will compete against a Southern Hemisphere squad, with the game serving as a fundraiser for tsunami relief.

Notable players include L Dallaglio (England), A Rougerie (France), F Pelous (France), P de Villiers (France), B O'Driscoll (Ireland, captain), P O'Connell (Ireland), D Humphreys (Ireland), C Paterson (Scotland), C Cusiter (Scotland), G Bullock (Scotland), S Taylor (Scotland), A Lo Cicero (Italy), M Bortolami (Italy), and several Welsh, Fijian, Australian, and New Zealand players.
The match promises to be a high-quality spectacle, with Woodward hoping the rugby community will generously contribute to tsunami relief efforts.
